original_title: UFC on ESPN 33: Blaydes vs. Daukaus
overview: UFC on ESPN 33: Blaydes vs. Daukaus was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on March 26, 2022 at the Nationwide Arena in Columbus, Ohio, United States. A heavyweight bout between Curtis Blaydes and Chris Daukaus headlined the event.
title: UFC on ESPN 33: Blaydes vs. Daukaus
